entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 8:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
